question: Elina Svitolina has won the 2018 women's singles Brisbane International tournament. She hails from which country?
explanation: Elina Svitolina, a Ukrainian professional tennis player, has won the 2018 women\'s singles Brisbane International tournament in Brisbane, Australia on January 6, 2018. She beat Belarusian qualifier Aliaksandra Sasnovich 6-2, 6-1 in the final to win her 10th title on the women\'s elite tour.
